channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Woodlands Road pot holes, 25th January
item.description:
Woodlands Road is in extremely poor state of potholes. One has been repairs recently and already caved in. Problem has definitely got worse since buses started using the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: One traffic light head has rotated round so not particularly visible from the road, 25th January

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Georges Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Public path sign is missing. The gate looks private. There's no way to know this is a public footpath., 25th January
item.description:
Pathway along the The Sheiling driveway on Badgeworth Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pot holes on both sides of single track lane, I drive a normal sized car and I now bottom out every single time I drive down this road. It has become awful as was used as a cut through to get to birdlip, but it’s so deep and broken up that no one can use it any more. I’m surprised no one has reported it yet. Not even sure a big can would make it down there so maybe walk to have a look first!, 25th January
item.description:
The road down this entire stretch is either perfect or the road is nearly gone and washed away completely. Someone needs to drive down there to see how bad it has gotten
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole. Car wheel could be trapped and damaged in it., 25th January

item.title: Blocking driveway, 25th January
item.description:
Hello, Hope you are well We came home at about 11.50 am to a blocked driveway. We need 24 hour access to our driveway. We are expecting a delivery soon. Could you help us sort this please? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doverdale Drive, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Road surface around the drain breaking up with one part about 9cm deep, 25th January
item.description:
Western end of bridge on Church Lane over Normans Brook. The drain cover has sunk about 5cm below the road surface. The drain at the eastern end of the bridge also has a 3-4cm hole by it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath is impassable due to slurry at least 40cm deep, 25th January
item.description:
There are three footpaths leading to a pedestrian access gate. All are impassable and will remain so until a significant period of dry warm weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witcombe Roman Villa, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
